cause.description:
Homework doesn't help anyone learn anything, it just puts a drain on our energy. Plus it sucks and is boring. There have been many scientific studies that show homework is useless. Join this cause to show that you hate homework and think it should be banned.
1. Homework is a waste of time.
2. Homework is a way for lazy teachers to cover parts of the curriculum inadequately just so they can say they've done it (and so they can get cheap marks).
3. Homework should be banned in the province of Ontario.
cause.name: Ban Homework in Ontario
